info.title: Gibbontake
info.subtitle: COMICS AND SUCH
description: Hello, my name is Gibbontake and i am an artist of some kind.
This website houses my webcomics, i hope you enjoy reading them.

comics.name: Clarissa Gunsmoke and the Bandit King
description: Clarissa Gunsmoke is a fiery cowgirl. She'll root ya, toot ya and then shoot ya!
Wandering through the desert on her trusty horse, "Saus" she gets into an altercation with a group of bandits that have been terrorising the area.
After a young boy pleads with her to save his sister from the "Bandit Gang", Clarissa finds herself embroiled in what can only be described as "a sequence of events".

comics.name: The Lord of Ghosts
description: A forgetful ghost wishes to end the endless cycle of war in slime city by killing everyone, he succeeds but is promptly overthrown.
Lost and confused, the Lord of Ghosts flees the city, looking for… oh god what was it again? He forgot.

chapters.name: Chapter 2: From bad to also bad

comics.name: Redman
description: In slime city, noone can hear you bleed.
That doesn't explain the comic at all, but that's ok. I don't know how to.

comics.name: Cannon Story
description: Cannon story is the story that involves a cannon at some point. Help Flowerhead, Boy and Dog figure out how to leave the premises of a church that has a flooded basement with a shark in it??

pages.title: Begin Cannon Story.
text: You are the flower head guy, a dog and a small boy stand next to you as you strike your menacing pose. Nothing could be as well planned as this.
What will you do? (Character code is FH)

pages.title: FH: LOOK EVEN MORE MEANACING.
text: You brandish your SAW as well as your razor sharp TEETH. You're clearly a force to be reckoned with, nobody fucks with “Flower Head” what a brilliant character design!

pages.title: FH: OBSERVE SURROUNDINGS.
text: You are in a dusty church hall, stained glass windows, pews, an organ, yep, it's a church. You feel as though god is watching you or something.
You don't give a shit about religion.

pages.title: FH: LOOK OUT WINDOW.
text: You take a look outside. You see a hedgerow with a wrought iron gate and a shiny black cannon in the courtyard below.
Nothing much you can do about all that up here.

pages.title: FH: PUT BOY INTO INVENTORY.
text: The boy fits snugly. While your inventory is open you holster your SAW.

pages.title: FH: CHECK OUT THAT ORGAN.
text: You examine the organ, it's an organ. There are two keyboards, many pipes, doohickeys and what looks like three sausages on the floor.

pages.title: FH: PLAY HAUNTING ORGAN REFRAIN.
text: You were never very good at the organ.
Smashing the organ keys resulted in a small box being tooted out of one of the pipes. It was probably part of some convoluted puzzle bullshit. Not that it matters now that it's outside.
Wait why is the dog down there?

pages.title: FH: ORDER DOG TO FETCH BOX.
text: You yell down to the dog to fetch the box, but nothing happens, the dog is nowhere to be seen.

pages.title: DOG: BE SOMEWHERE TO BE SEEN.
text: "Dog" is not a valid character code!
It doesn't matter though, the dog is now see-able. You see him.

pages.title: FH: USE BOY ON DOG.
text: You combine the boy with the dog.
The combination was a success! Dog and Boy are now a TEAM!
(Unlocked character code: DB)

pages.title: FH: BE DB.
text: You don't know how to “BE DB”!
Also DB is gone you guess?

pages.title: DB: BE.
text: You are now DB. You are outside in the courtyard.

pages.title: DB: UNTEAM.
text: You successfully unteam. You are now BOY (character code: BOY)

pages.title: BOY: pick up box.
text: You HAVE the BOX.

pages.title: BOY: EXAMINE BOX.
text: The box appears to be a PUZZLE, you see some grooves and a switch.

pages.title: BOY: SOLVE PUZZLE WITH EASE.
text: You flick the switch. The box slides open along the groove, revealing a small circular compartment with a marble inside.
This has got to be the shittiest PUZZLE BOX you've ever solved.

pages.title: BOY: RETRIEVE MARBLE.
text: You retrieve the heck outta that marble.

pages.title: FH: OBSERVE BOY LIKE A PROUD FATHER.
text: You're not sure what a “father” is, but that boy has done nothing worthy of anybodies pride. That PUZZLE BOX was so easy to solve it's honestly embarrassing that he's not throwing a tantrum right now.
You decide to provide a wary glare instead.

pages.title: FH: CONTINUE GLARING.
text: You cannot continue glaring as you have been INTERRUPTED by a loud banging on the door that has been there the whole time.
You instinctively un-holster your SAW.
You have been challenged by a CRUSADER! His stance is powerful and sturdy, his blade unwavering, he is an intimidating foe to be sure.

pages.title: FH: LUNGE.
text: You can't lunge with a saw, numbnuts!

You opt instead to LEAP into battle like a badass with no regard for personal safety or technique, making it look more awesome you think. In reality the art is so terrible that nothing you do will look awesome, but that's neither here nor there.

pages.title: EDITOR: CUT AWAY TO B-PLOT.
text: You activate the CHEAT CODE and switch to the B-plot. You could have just as easily used a character code but nevermind.
Here we see BOY wielding his BIGLEY RAYGUN and the dog also is there.

pages.title: BOY: USE BIGLEY RAY ON MARBLE.
text: You aim the gun at the marble and it expands to the size of a CANNONBALL. You wonder where this could be used.

pages.title: BOY: PUT HUGE MARBLE IN CANNON.
text: You are too weak to lift the marble! Somehow the bigley ray increases mass along with size.

pages.title: BOY: ORDER DOG TO CARRY HUGE MARBLE.
text: You RE-TEAM with the dog and explain what you need him to do in a polite friendly manner.

pages.title: DB: PUT HUGE MARBLE IN CANNON.
text: Using TEAMWORK you manage to get the huge marble into the cannon. The dog receives +1 mouth-strain damage. The cannon upgrades to [FULLY LOADED].

pages.title: FH: WIN BATTLE.
text: It's a little difficult to win a battle with a sword guy because your weapons keep locking together, which makes for a very awkward exchange where both parties can do little else but stare at each other.
You're beginning to regret choosing a saw as your MUTILATOOL but there's not much you can do about it now.

pages.title: FH: EAT OPPONENT USING SHARP TEETH.
text: You fail to eat your opponent as he has been slain by a huge marble.
The marble steals all of the EXP points. You are miffed.

pages.title: FH: LOOT CORPSE.
text: You loot the crusaders sword and shield. The huge marble is fused with the spinal column of the crusader and can no longer be acquired unless you saw the marble off, but honestly who cares? It's arc is over.

pages.title: FH: LEAVE THROUGH THE DOOR.
text: You leave through the door that was always there into the corridor that was always there. You see a flight of stairs.

pages.title: FH: BE WARY OF STAIRS.
text: You were right to be wary, the stairwell appears to be flooded, fish can be seen swimming in it.

pages.title: FH: ATTEMPT TO STAB FISH WITH SWORD.
text: You wield the SWORD and cautiously approach the closest fish. You know things underwater are not necessarily where they appear to be due to light refraction or some shit.
The light refraction was way more potent than you anticipated, the SHARK drags you underwater before you can let go of the sword.

pages.title: FH: CURL UP IN A BALL AND ADMIT DEFEAT.
text: The sharks are momentarily taken aback by the sheer wimpitude on display.

pages.title: FH: TAKE OPPORTUNITY TO EAT SHARK.
text: Of course! the wimp ruse was a distraction all along! You take a wide gape bite on the snout of one of the sharks. It is noticeably distressed.

pages.title: FH: WRESTLE SHARK FOR DOMINANCE.
text: The shark attempts to swim away down the stairs but you cling to it and chew on its face. The other shark is too surprised to follow.

pages.title: DB: EXPLAIN HOW YOU SHOT THE CANNON.
text: This is how. You are totally accepting of this explanation and can move on with your life.
The dogs back sturdiness stat has given way to the cannons weight attribute. DB is forced to UN-TEAM once again.
You are now BOY.

pages.title: BOY: CHECK ON DOG.
text: The dog is alive but in serious pain. You use your BOINTUITION to determine the dogs hopes and dreams.
It appears he wants an apple.

pages.title: BOY: LOOK AROUND FOR APPLETREE.
text: Luckily for you an apple tree is right there in plain sight. It's probably why the dog wanted an apple in the first place.

pages.title: BOY: CLIMB TREE.
text: You scoot up the tree.
You climb the tree and find a nice juicy apple. Well that was easy.
You are prevented from nabbing the apple by the KING OF THE BIRDS. He tells you to “fuc of” You're so hurt by this that you begin to cry.

pages.title: BOY: CRY SOME MORE.
text: You sit on the branch and cry SADBOI tears. It's so overwhelmingly sad that the king of birds begins crying too. The dog is also crying but probably for pain reasons.

pages.title: FH: ENOUGH OF THIS SAPPY CRAP.
text: That isn't a command but you totally agree. You begin being unsappy by posing with your newly quelled shark slave. Quelled really isn't the right word for what's been transpiring here but you're too busy being short of breath to think of a better one.

pages.title: FH: BE SHORT OF BREATH.
text: Wrestling a shark underwater for any amount of time is sure to be a drain on the old airbags and you've been wrestling a shark for decidedly longer than that.
You need air and fast.

pages.title: FH: SUCK AIR OUT OF SHARK GILLS.
text: You press your lips up against the gills of your shark, you're almost certain that this is where they dispense air they don't want.
That didn't help at all! You begin to panic, at this point you'll do ANYTHING for some air.

pages.title: FH: EAT FISH FARTS FOR AIR.
text: Oh god you actually did it. You can't believe you were that desperate. How fortuitous that nobody was looking, otherwise you'd be known as the “fish fart” guy forever and if that DID happen you'd wish you were dead anyway.

pages.title: FH: EXAMINE SURROUNDINGS.
text: Well you can see a crab, but you doubt he was paying attention to your fish fart sucking so you pay him no mind.
Oh and you're in a grand foyer of some kind, empty suits of armour line the walls, you see a treasure chest on the floor and daylight shines down from a hole in the ceiling.

pages.title: FH: ORDER SHARK TO OPEN TREASURE CHEST.
text: You cleverly predict that the chest will be difficult and time consuming to open yourself so you instruct your minion to bite it open.
The shark misunderstands the command and begins swallowing the chest whole.
The weight of the chest causes the shark to sink, it's now useless as a mount and looks frankly ridiculous.

pages.title: FH: CUT SHARK AND CHEST OPEN TO RECEIVE TREASURE.
text: With pleasure.
Your sawmanship is exemplary and it only takes a couple of zips before you get through.

pages.title: FH: RETRIEVE TREASURE.
text: What the hell is that? you think, it looks like it was barely worth the effort. You grab it anyway and begin swimming up to the hole in the ceiling. You have no more sources of air left and dilly dallying is not a good idea anymore.
You find a bucket on the end of a rope, cling to it for a moment to catch your breath.

pages.title: FH: PULL YOURSELF UP.
text: You tug on the rope, but you only seem to pull the rope downwards, instead of yourself upwards.
You are now BOY. You notice the well rope being tugged from below.

pages.title: BOY: EXAMINE WELL.
text: You look down the well and see your friend! it looks like he is trouble!

pages.title: BOY: STOP THE WINCH.
text: You are not tall enough to reach the winch!

pages.title: BOY: CRY ABOUT IT.
text: You cry about the fact that your friend is drowning and you cannot save him. The King of the birds is once again affected by your adorable patheticness. The dog cannot see what is going on and thus is not pictured, but is likely still crying tears of agonising discomfort.

pages.title: FH: JUST SWIM TO THE TOP YOU IDIOT.
text: You are too stressed and lacking in air to think straight and cannot do the easiest thing that will solve the problem.
How embarrassing.
You are now KING OF THE BIRDS (character code: KB)
You have landed on the handle of the winch in an attempt to hold it in place, how very valiant.

pages.title: KB: HAVE EFFORTS BE IN VAIN.
text: Your tiny body is hardly heavy enough to weigh down the handle and you are caught in it's unending whirl.
Your crown falls off due to the spinning, thus demoting you to ASSHOLE BIRD (new character code: AB)

pages.title: BOY: RETRIEVE CROWN.
text: The crown lands in the ground in front of you, its sharp pointy bits penetrating the soil.
You have an idea.

pages.title: BOY: THROW CROWN AT ROPE.
text: You hurl the crown at the rope, it sinks into the wood and pins the rope against it, preventing any further turnery.

pages.title: FH: PULL YOURSELF UP YOU COMPLETE DUMBASS.
text: You haul yourself out of the god damned well and slump onto the floor.
Your buddyboy gives you a classic thumbs up to mark the occasion.

pages.title: BOY: DO A JOLLY JIG.
text: You can't contain your exuberance at seeing your bestest friend not be drowning!
You giggle daintily as you gayly jaunt tither and thither. It's ridiculous.

pages.title: FH: PRESENT TREASURE.
text: You present the treasure to the boy, what is it? he says, no freakin' idea you say, but it's definitely what you came here to get that's for sure, how do you know? he asks, i don't you say, i just wanna ske-freakin-daddle outta this joint and if this is the only thing in the only treasure chest in the whole place then fu- freak it, it's the treasure we came for. 'K he says. You hand him the treasure for safe keeping.

pages.title: AB: TAKE MORE OF THIS CRAP.
text: You fail to take any more of this crap. Shoehorning in LORE? at this hour? Ridiculous, SHEESH in fact.

pages.title: BOY: PUT ASSHOLE BIRD INTO INVENTORY.
text: You scoop up the bird and safely inventorise him.

pages.title: CANNON STORY: END.
text: And so Flower Head, Boy and the dog escape from the church courtyard, was that gate even locked? nobody knows.
They walk off into the sunset because it's cooler that way.
LE FIN

comics.name: Bail Jape
description: Pumk and Alley Oop are locked up in some sorta jail. How? Why? Never you mind that. Just help them escape!
Bail Jape asks YOU, the reader, to choose what actions the characters take, from a list of one option per page ONLY. It’s like a video game but without freedom of choice.
What, you though you could control Pumk? Nobody can do that.
Except for that one page where it’s literally a video game where you control Pumk.

pages.title: BEGIN BAIL JAPE
code: DB: ikr, this code shit is wild
text: You are PUMK, a wily pumpkin lass who don’t take no guff from no BIG CHEESE. You’re the coolest, don’t even think about questioning that, any residual dust motes of doubt in your mind that this GOURDGEOUS GAL is anything other than a PERFECT CHARACTER will be plucked viciously from your cold dead brain.
With you is ALLEY OOP, you don’t know who she is and you don’t give a SHIT, that’s how cool you are.
What will you do?

pages.title: PUMK: OBSERVE SURROUNDINGS
text: You scan the stage for stuff, you shouldn’t even need to think about observing your surroundings, it should really go without saying if you’re being honest with yourself.

pages.title: PUMK: CHECK OUT YOUR STRIFE SPECIBUS
text: You have no idea what a strife specibus is and frankly the notion of such a thing deserves a threatening gesture.
You brandish your GIANT PAPERCLIP to show you mean business. Careful, you could poke someones eye out with that thing!

pages.title: PUMK: BE ALLEY OOP
text: You cannot be ALLEY OOP because she is busy concerning herself with her ELECTRONIC SLAB.
What could she be looking at?
You glance over her shoulder, it appears she’s playing that smash hit from the gaming scene, POCKETBOI HAVE.
It looks really stupid.

pages.title: PUMK: LOOK OUT WINDOW
text: You cast your flickering eyeholes red-ward.
Outside the window you see a tall crooked tower with an ominous purple light emanating from inside surrounded by an ocean of lava. The bridge to the tower looks to be out and…
Why is that Y there?
Y you ask?
said nobody
Because that’s a stupid lame joke for gay crippled babies who are also dead, only those particular babies would have laughed at that joke. You know it.

pages.title: SKELETON: HAVE A HAT
text: Dapper.

pages.title: PUMK: BE A STRONG FEMALE CHARACTER AND BEND THOSE BARS
text: You don’t need to BE a strong female character because you already are one. You grip the bars firmly and tuuAAHGH!
The bars were SNAKES all along.

pages.title: PUMK: FREAK OUT
text: You freak the fuck out about the snakes, nothing much is accomplished.

pages.title: ALLEY OOP: FOR THE SLAM DUNK
SKELETON: TEAR UP EMOTIONALLY AT THIS SPECTACLE
text: You shed a single tear from your tear duct.
Even though you don’t have any.
(YOHOHOHO Skull joke!)

pages.title: SNAKE-1: BE VERY CONFUSED
text: You do this with ease, it is easy for you.

pages.title: PLAYER: STOP BEING RANDOM UNIMPORTANT CHARACTERS
text: You are now PUMK again, who is arguably important.

You tell Alley Oop to explore outside the window now that two of the bars are gone, you can’t fit through yourself unless all of them are removed and you’d love to do that but, y’know, could be more snakes.

pages.title: ALLEY: EXPLORE OUTSIDE
text: You sidle along a ledge outside the window and onto a balcony, you can see more of the extremely elaborate building off to the side.
It’s a long way down, if you were to slip and fall you’d be dead, either by landing on a hard surface or the searing hot lava.
This is a very dangerous and possibly unnecessary plan.

pages.title: PUMK: LOOK AT THE OTHER WALL
text: You turn around and find that there was a door there the whole time. Maybe this should’ve been pointed out when you observed your surroundings, but you thought that went without saying, how did you get IN the room if there wasn’t one?

pages.title: PUMK: TURN GIANT PAPERCLIP INTO LOCKPICK
text: You brandish your giant paperclip and commence with the turning.
You have no idea how to make a lock-pick so you bend it into the shape of a crowbar instead, you’re also pretty sure that there never was a lock to pick anyway?

pages.title: PUMK: PRY DOOR OPEN WITH CROWBAR
text: You pry the fuck outta the door, the hinges break off and it falls forward into the dark corridor.
Oh look you were right, there WAS no lock. Why the hell would a prison door have a lock on the inside?

pages.title: PUMK: WANDER OFF INTO THE DARKNESS
text: You’ve never understood the concept of darkness because your head is a jack o’ lantern and has a candle inside. You confidently stride down the corridor, your flickering face holes lighting the way.

pages.title: ALLEY: FIND A WAY INSIDE
text: Hey calm down, there’s no need to rush, there’s lots of poketbois to catch around here.
You HAVE the GHOULDRA +450 Gristlets +100 XP, pretty sweet.
Ok, what were you saying? Find a way inside? Sure, you can do that, there’s windows all over the place to choose from.

pages.title: ALLEY: CONSIDER WINDOW CHOICES
text: You consider three windows which are helpfully labelled. You could enter any one of these, or in fact move along the balcony to find more, really the possibilities are endless.

Each window could lead to a whole separate labyrinth, a long and winding passageway that would take many hours to traverse. The choice is honestly a little too much to handle, you defer to the reader to decide on which of these three fucking incredible adventures to begin first.

pages.title: ALLEY: PICK WHATEVER
text: Your choices meant nothing, obviously, the windows were right next to each other. What did you expect?
More interesting than any of that funny cheeky meta shit though is a RARE poketboi that just appeared on your radar, what even IS that?
It’s NEW!
No it’s not “new” new, it’s the name of the poketboi, geez get a grip, we’re not going to go full Abbott and Costello over this.

You wonder about this going full Abbott and Costello and honestly fail to see how it could be applicable to their famous comedy sketch and wish you hadn’t tried thinking about it because now it’s not as impressive a reference. also WHAT?
This “NEW” is pretty rare, you just gotta HAVE it! This will require all your concentration.

pages.title: ALLEY: RAGE
text: You did not need any prompting for that.

pages.title: PUMK: EXPLORE THE DARKNESS
text: You continue your stride darkways and come across a ledge, your candle flicker doesn’t reach the floor, looks like you’ll have to stop.

pages.title: PUMK: TURN THAT SMILE UPSIDE DOWN
text: You are more than happy to oblige.

pages.title: PUMK: EXAMINE SURROUNDINGS
text: Not much surrounds you, there’s a floor and walls, yeah there’s absolutely nothing worth investigating, maybe you should just go back?

pages.title: PUMK: TURN LEFT
text: Ok, you’re not sure what turning left would accompli- oh.
Well how about that? There’s a lever.

pages.title: PUMK: PULL THE LEVER
text: You pay no attention to the number on your hand because you already know what it is and thus don’t need to examine or consider it.
You pull the lever, a thick bristly rope falls from the darkness above.

pages.title: PUMK: PUT FACE RIGHT UP CLOSE TO ROPE
text: You move your face really close to the rope, nothing happens. Rope is not commonly known to react to a scary pumpkin girls face.

pages.title: PUMK: SCARE THE ROPE
text: You make your scariest face in an attempt to debunk the theory that rope does not scare easily. Goodness you! If there was a mirror here right now you’d probably faint from how scary you’re being. SO scary.

pages.title: ROPE: BE SCARED ABOUT IT
text: You can’t be scared because you are a rope and ropes are very strong willed.
Rope can catch fire though.

pages.title: ROPE: CATCH FIRE
text: Sweet catch!

It appears the rope has carried the fire over to a chandelier which has lit up to reveal a gigantic gold plated cathedral hall. Tall red pillars adorn the sides and you guess you were inside one this whole time?
You don’t give a shit about architecture.

pages.title: PUMK: EXAMINE FAR OFF PAINTING
text: What IS that thing over there? It’s like a black orb with two legs but then another leg on it’s head?
Maybe you should zoom in by some mystical telescopeless non-diagetic magic and be able to see it better for the benefit of the viewing public.

pages.title: PUMK: ENHANCE
text: You enhance your vision and can now make out an ostrich in the painting. You are confused by its gross pink neck, it reminds you of snakes, which, as has been established, are not to your tastes.

pages.title: PUMK: STEW IN OSTRICH HATE
text: You continue to stare at the painting, disliking ostriches more with every second, you don’t know what an ostrich is so you mentally refer to it as a “snake neck leg ball”.
Fuck em you say, you hope you never meet one.

pages.title: PUMK: ENHANCE FURTHER
text: You cannot enhance any further than that don’t you know how EYES work?
Look at this terrible image it has no additional information, you can’t add information to an image by zooming in, it’s just not a thing anyone can do, pumpkin OR machine.

pages.title: SHOT: REVERSE
text: You reverse yourself and now the shot is of Pumk again, still looking at the painting. This meta joke isn’t very funny and shouldn’t have made it into the final product.

pages.title: FUNNY META JOKE: CONTINUE
text: No, we’re noOOAAUGH!
That’s a pretty dang scary snake neck leg ball if you’re being honest, and you are being honest because currently you are a meta joke.

pages.title: STOP: BEGIN
text: The stopping begins and is rapidly gaining traction in the paragraph, pretty soon all of this bullshit will have stopped completely.

You are Alley Oop. You have been chasing after the fiend that stole your rectangle for about 6 minutes when you appear in a room with no exit. You pause to consider where in the room they could be hiding.

pages.title: ALLEY: LOOK AROUND
text: You scan your eyes around the room, nothing looks suspicious….
You hear fabric ruffling above your head.

pages.title: BLUE LADY: BE INTRODUCED
text: While you are a “Blue lady” you prefer to be catcalled by your maiden name: Tikiwikimiki-Mau.
You are busy inspecting a new SCIENCE potion, it is greenish in hue, and liquid in fact.

pages.title: TIKI: INSPECT POTION
text: There is no need to inspect the potion due to the previously established facts that it is a green liquid.
You do notice some bubbles though.

pages.title: TIKI: CONSUME TASTY BREW
text: The potion is not tasty nor was it brewed, but ok.
You consume the potion the only way you know how, through blunt force trauma.
In your hands you now hold the most powerful weapon known to man. A broken glass thingy. This is your weapon of choice and how apt, because it is, itself, CHOICE.
You could poke someone’s eyes out with that thing, like SEVERAL eyes. You should probably unbrandish it.

pages.title: TIKI: UNBRANDISH BROKEN FLASK
text: You unbrandish the BROKEN FLASK into your inventory.

pages.title: TIKI: TAKE ANOTHER POTION
text: You go above and beyond the call of duty and take everything. You always were an over-achiever.

pages.title: TIKI: LOOK AROUND
text: In your immediate vicinity are “THE JEWEL OF SPLISH” levitating between two jewel stalagteats and a totally fake trapdoor.
Nothing else is particularly noteworthy and is thus not in frame.

pages.title: TIKI: TOUCH THE JEWEL
text: You cannot touch the JEWEL because of the magical push-veil surrounding it. THE JEWEL OF SPLISH shouldn’t be touched anyway, it’s crucial for protecting your hut from the lava outside.
If it were to be STOLEN that would be extremely rude.
It would also result in your death probably.

pages.title: TRAPDOOR: OPEN
text: You cannot open of your own accord. Luckily the MYSTERIOUS THIEF opens you for you, he is clutching Alley Oops rectangle and appears to be in a hurry.

pages.title: ALLEY: CATCH THE THIEF
text: You.
Have.
Been.
TRYING.

pages.title: PUMK: DO SOMETHING ALREADY
text: You have been standing here for some time staring off into the distance and pondering ostriches, it’s high time you did at least one actual thing.
But what can you do? There’s nothing within reach.

pages.title: PUMK: LOOK DOWN NUMBNUTS
text: It’s the floor, now that the room is illuminated you can see how close it is. It’s not actually the leg-breaking drop you first assumed it was.

It seems like having a pumpkin for a head is pretty bad for your vision, but whatever man you don’t NEED glasses, they’re totally lame and you can see the blackboard just fine without them GEEZ mum, shut up!
Anyway you could probably get down there quite easily with your sick goth girl parkour.

pages.title: PUMK: INITIATE GOTH GIRL PARKOUR
text: That’s SICK goth girl parkour, man, get it right!
Using your paperclip crowbar you dangle down to the ground and strike an impressive pose.
Congratulations you are now on the floor.

pages.title: PUMK: EXPLORE THE FLOORS
text: You walk around the opulent palace. You come across many varieties of ostrich arts.
Haha what the fuck is even UP with that one?
Is this an Ostrichapel or something?
What is WITH all the ostriches man? Somebody’s gotta be all toke’d up like STONED or something!
Alright you ain’t got time to be pondering all these snake neck leg ball fung shway or gung shwee or whatever you call it, you got places to be and all of them are far away.
This corridor looks nice and plain, thank fuck.
In the dimly lit corridor you come across a large set of doors with a big keyhole in the middle. You haven’t found a key anywhere and the door looks too heavy to crowbar open.

pages.title: PUMK: GO BACK AND LOOK FOR A KEY
text: God no, ugh.
You hurried past all that ridiculous tacky gross ostrich stuff for a reason, you’re not about to go back and spend ANY time in the presence of that.
Despite its apparent futility you would prefer to try crowbaring the door instead.

pages.title: PUMK: ATTEMPT FUTILE CROWBARING
text: Hang on there, hold any and all horses. Your paperclip crowbar is flashing somethin’ fierce.
Your paperclip has turned into a key!
A lockpick would have made more sense but hey, who cares?

pages.title: PUMK: UNLOCK THE DOOR
text: Hell yes! You’re gonna UN-fucking-LOCK that sun’bitch, you’re gonna HACK into the MAINframe and get EARLY-ACCESS to a funny fucken video game with this sweet piece! You’re gonna BLOW this hingefest so goddamn wide it’s going to literally become A JAR!
That door didn’t take too kindly be being UNZIPPED, it’s freaking the fuck out!
You decide to give it some space so it can calm down.

pages.title: PUMK: OPEN DOOR
text: Please let there be no ostriches in here…
Ooh!

pages.title: PUMK: AAH!
text: AGH!
It’s extremely bright, so bright that you have to squint, even though your eyes are literally a light source.
What the hell is behind this door?
You can just barely make out… oh.
It was just a spotlight, what a stupid trick. It’s not even barring the way, it’s just there to be annoying.

pages.title: PUMK: EASILY BYPASS THE DETERRENT
text: You’re not even sure if it was supposed to be a deterrent.
You enter the room and notice a green glow.
On the other side of the room is a huge computer screen displaying a wobbly green line.
Underneath it is a bunch of other screens and what looks like a keyboard.
The green line appears to be talking to you but you aren’t listening, something about “man behind the door” and “super mysterious data” you couldn’t pay attention if you tried.

pages.title: PUMK: APPROACH TERMINAL
text: The terminal is streaming a lot of flashy data, it’d be almost hypnotising if you gave a shit.

pages.title: GREEN GUY: BLAB
text: You blabber and prattle a hard as you can but it seems to fall on deaf ears.
Do pumpkins have ears? You know corn does…

pages.title: PUMK: MASH ON KEYBOARD
text: Sorry what was that? You weren’t listening.

pages.title: PUMK: DISRESPECT AUTHORITY
text: You follow the instructions to the letter.
You hear a loud boom from somewhere, it appears smashing the computer caused an explosion you guess.

pages.title: PUMK: BE ALLEY OOP
text: You are now Alley Oop. You kinda forgot that character switching was a thing, It seems to happen automagically sometimes.
You just got done witnessing a large cannonball fall into the lava, it made a big SPLOOSH, it was pretty neat.

pages.title: ALLEY: TAKE STOCK OF SITUATION
text: You have your ELECTRONIC SLAB back.
That’s really all the stock you feel the need to take.
You pass the buck over to Tikiwikimiki-Mau while you look at the poketbois you have.

pages.title: TIKI: TAKE STOCK OF SITUATION
text: You take stock of the open trapdoor, also the mysterious purple guy seems to be gone. You don’t know why he handed you that rectangle and likely neither does he.
(You have now taken 2 stocks, if you take just 3 more you’ll have enough STOCKS to “MARKET”. For a tutorial on marketing stocks press the X in the top right of your browser window.)
There’s only one thing left to take stock of.

pages.title: TIKI: SLURP UP THAT FINAL STOCK
text: We cut away from the currently transpiring STOCK-SLURPING to have a cheeky gander at ya boi THIS GUY.
He HASS the Jewel, how’d he get that? and who is he? So many questions?

pages.title: TIKI:O
text: You :O at the fact that THE JEWEL OF SPLISH is missing!
FUCK! You think. Your brain sure has a potty-mouth.
This doesn’t look too good.

pages.title: MAP: TIE WORLD TOGETHER
text: The ever-handy Map appears. Now you know where everything is in relation to everything else. It almost looks like it was planned.
Alley Oop and Tikiwikimiki-Mau are in the hut, now Splishless and burning.
The purple guy has the jewel.
And Pumk is in the secret computer room being a rebel.

pages.title: PUMK: BASK IN REBELLIOUSNESS
text: It comes naturally to you, you bask like a pro.
The green line is getting pretty aggravated but you continue to ignore it, you’re so very good at that.

pages.title: PUMK: FAIL TO IGNORE GREEN LINE GUY
text: Did that motherfucker just say something about imminent snakes?
Snakes imminently begin pouring out of pipes in the wall. They’re slithery and deadly and extremely scary, you’re scared out of your mind.
There’s only one reaction you can make that accurately portrays how you feel about this turn of events.

pages.title: PUMK :O
text: You :O harder than you’ve ever :O’d before.
You better stop before you :Overdose.
Who the hell keeps this many snakes in an ostrich cathedral? It’s just not right.

pages.title: PUMK: LEG IT
text: You leg it.
The Map returns, perhaps a little too soon?
Regardless it serves as a decent point from which to switch to another character.
What? no you can’t click on them, this is a webcomic not an ANGRY BIRDS.

pages.title: TIKI: SCRAMBLE DOWN THEM STAIRS
text: Scrambling is well underway.

pages.title: TIKI: LOOK UP
text: You notice a big ol’ crumbling happening above you. You cautiously halt your leg strides.

pages.title: TIKI: OBSERVE CARNAGE
text: You spot the iron boulder that fell into the lava short while ago, it’s red hot. You also notice lava pouring in from the ceiling. You didn’t need to pose so confidently while you observed that, but it sure was cool.
Unlike the temperature.

pages.title: PURPLE GUY: HAVE A NAME ALREADY
text: Oh, alright, your name is SIBI but don’t tell anyone.
You are clutching THE JEWEL OF SPLISH safely in your arms. It fills you with glee to have made off with such a covetable item.

pages.title: SIBI: FEEL TOO MUCH GLEE
text: You become so gleeful that you begin to cry? You’re not sure what’s up with that, it doesn’t seem to make any sense.
Hold on, you hear something up ahead.

pages.title: SIBI: GLIMPSE THAT SOMETHING
text: You catch a glimpse of a frazzled looking pumpkin girl, she’s out of breath as indicated by the air cauliflower. You wonder where she came from.

pages.title: SIBI: CONTINUE HAVIN’ A GANDER
text: Oh, whats this? She perked up for some reason.

pages.title: SIBI: SCOPE THAT BITCHES CHOICE GOURD
text: You have to temporarily postpone your scoping to duck out of line of sight her own scope.

pages.title: SIBI: SNEAK A PEEK AT THE OLD BIRD
text: She is neither old nor a bird… i mean maybe she is. Old that is, not a bird, that wouldn’t make any sense, but she could be old. You have no idea what the life-cycle is like for a pumpkin girl. You recall that pumpkins rot rather quickly after Halloween. So maybe she has a relatively short life? Yes you have Halloween in this universe, gosh! Why are you asking so many questions?
Anyway she ran down the hall, you wonder what spooked her.

pages.title: SIBI: SCOOT FORWARDS A TAD
text: You scoot forwards a tad-length, you hear a long protruded s followed by more s’s.

pages.title: SIBI: TWIST HEAD S-WAYS
text: You twist your head and can hear more s’s, they sound more like S’s now.
You also spot a weird black shape squirming and undulating down the corridor towards you.

pages.title: ALLEY OOP: PAY ATTENTION TO THE FIRE
text: You are not going to do that because you have your trusty rectangle with you and are one of those “millennials” that are glued to their screens like a cowpat is to the ground. Which is to say not really that much if you think about it, but are YOU gonna disturb that? at least get some gloves first, or a pointed stick.

pages.title: ALLEY: PLEASE NOTICE WHAT’S HAPPENING
text: You begin lookind in the direction of gravity to understand the gravity of the situation.
Theys lava.
Theys lava down there.
Shit.

pages.title: TIKI: BE DOWN THERE WITH THE LAVA
text: You succeed at this pitifully easy task because you were already down there and didn’t even need to do anything.
You’ll probably need to do something soon though.

pages.title: TIKI: DO SOMETHING
text: You do “something” while striking a dynamic pose. It’s fuckin’ sick and totally the most efficient way to open two flasks of green liquid.
What does that stuff do anyway?

pages.title: SOMETHING: HAPPEN
text: You are now something currently happening.
You feel very… reactive.

pages.title: SOMETHING: REACT!
text: That sounds like a very stupid idea for a youtube series.
You wonder how badly that last sentence will date this comic…
Wait. No you don’t, you’re a torrent of green liquid. You have no time to wonder about the timelessness of your every passing thought.
In fact it seem you have no time left at all.

pages.title: REACTION: BEGIN!
text: You know you don’t really need to command the chemical reaction to do anything, it’s going to do what-
Hang on we should probably be further away than this.

pages.title: BOOM!
text: Boom indeed.

pages.title: ALLEY: DIE ALREADY
text: You’re getting around to that!
But first you notice a weird pattern emerging in the lava beneath you. The loud BOOM seems to have disturbed something.
This is either going to be perfectly fine or kill you instantly. But there’s no way to know which one it is. The suspense is killing you!

pages.title: ALLEY: SURVIVE
text: You land on a hard metal something emerging out of the lava, thereby surviving your imminent death, nobody could have seen that coming.

pages.title: ALLEY: RIDE THE METAL THING TO SAFETY
text: You cling to the thing and realise that it’s the CANNONBALL that landed there earlier. The explosion must have catapulted it upwards.

pages.title: ALLEY: RIDE THE CANNONBALL TO SAFETY
text: This doesn’t look safe.

pages.title: ALLEY: DO A FANCY LEAP
text: You leap fancily.
Wait, did you mean “do a fancy leap to safety”?

pages.title: ALLEY: FALL IN THE LAVA ANYWAY
text: The lava is very hot, and despite your fiery disposition you don’t like burning to death, you have a better idea.
You start to doubt the betterness of this idea.
You have tied two snakes together, remember those guys? You wonder if they’re still very confused. They’re almost certainly very in pain.

pages.title: ALLEY: USE SNAKES AS GRAPPLING HOOK
text: You swing the grappling snakes around your head and fling them Y-wards!
They were so shocked that they swallowed their tongues, hence the lack of tongue depiction.

pages.title: GRAPPLING SNAKES: INITIATE SNAKETECH: DUAL Y-CHOMP!
text: Y -> Ỹ
SUCCESS!
Grappling Snakes level up!
+45 Toothache
+23 Confusion
-5 Snaketears
Gained new passive ability: Immobile!
That’s the last we’ll be seeing of that Y, soak it in, take a picture, it’s finally had it’s day of relevance and we can finally all stop worrying about it.

pages.title: ALLEY OOP: LAND IMMEDIATELY
text: You cannot land immediately as you were flung quite high into the air, give it a couple more seconds…
… just a couple more…
There you go, a perfect landing on the side of a window.
Now all you need to do is to land on the floor.

pages.title: ALLEY: LAND ON THE FLOOR
text: You splat upon the floor like a marshmallow with hair.

pages.title: ALLEY: WAKE UP
text: You weren’t asleep but you’re certainly a little dazed, your perfectly bobbled hair curls have been ruffled.
Your head also hurts, though due to how soft and squishy you are you think that there’ll be no lasting damage.
You really have no idea what the hell you’re made of, you might actually be a marshmallow.
You notice a pair of ominous glowing eyes in the darkness, this is an opportune moment to be somebody else.

pages.title: ALLEY: BE PUMK
text: You are now Pumk.
You have just finished successfully evading the snakes and are feeling pretty jubilant about it.  This is pretty stellar time to have switched to you, those snakes have NO idea where you are now.
In fact you have a feeling you won’t need to run away from snakes ever again, thank god.
(pages marked with [s] have sound that plays on them, so be ready to crank that shit)

content.text: Ah, yes, nice and quiet, no snakes here. Look at that lovely fucked up architecture. The explosion you heard earlier seems to have shaken the whole cathedral. It seems to be holding together though.
Well, time to walk down this peaceful corridor totally uninterrup-
(users on mobile will have to skip this page, it’s a video game, shhh ==>)
The snakes are coming! Use WASD/ARROW KEYS to move, the SPACEBAR/LEFT CLICK to jump and LEFT-SHIFT/RIGHT CLICK to swing your keyblade.
(alternatively you can use a gamepad controller device. LEFT STICK to move, A BUTTON to Jump, B BUTTON to attack)
Thanks to Polystation 2 for creating the pumk model and Lateralyst for creating the music
and BIG thanks to Chuz for programming the game and also helping a lot with the web functionality (fuck wordpress.com)
This game can be PURCHASED over at his itch.io here: https://charlie-batten.itch.io/run-away-from-snakes
Give him money, he deserves it.

text: Those snakes just don’t quit, you’re tired as fuck.
You amble most staggeringly into the darkness. Your facial flicker is dangerously low.
Oh fuck what is it now?
Is that a demon or whatever? What’s the DEAL with goddamn demons coming outta the goddamn shadows?
How about you go back to the shadow, ya asshole!

pages.title: DEMON: REVEAL TRUE FORM
text: Oh wait, that’s not a demon, it’s a little guy you guess?
What’s it doing? Are those ears? You don’t really get it.

pages.title: LITTLE GUY: MESMERISE
text: Ow! Geez. Does EVERYTHING in this comic have to induce epileptic fits? Calm down little guy.

pages.title: PUMK: BE MESMERISED
text: You fail to be mesmerised because you don’t actually have eyeballs or retinas. You can feel the mesmer-waves though and it certainly feels fuckin’ sick.
You “woh” in awe.

pages.title: SNAKES: BE MESMERISED
text: You, as in “y’all snakes”, are totally mesmerised by the display. Transfixed in what can only be described as snakuriosity, you stop, forgetting all about the pumpkin girl you were supposed to be chasing.

pages.title: PUMK: HATCH BRILLIANT SCHEME
text: You turn to face your stationary, serpentine associates and grin an evil grin. You have hatched the most brilliant of schemes, involving snakes being gone forever, you and this weird flashing fairy.
Part one of your scheme involves eating this little lad. In you go, sunshine.

pages.title: PUMK: TRANSFORM.
text: You begin your epic transformation, the snakes, now no longer mesmerised, are mostly confused by your actions.

pages.title: PUMK: SUCCESSFULLY SCARE THE ROPE!
text: Your transformation is complete! Your SUPER SPOOKY FACE is surely more than enough to scare the rope this time!
(you know that the snakes are not ACTUALLY ropes but you really wanted to make that sick gamer reference because you are also a gamer girl ass well as a pumpkin)

pages.title: SNAKES: BE SCARED ABOUT IT
text: You do so with ease, it is easy for you to be scared at such a scary spooky face. You collectively begin to cry.

pages.title: SNAKES: SCARPER
text: You SCARPER as fast as your little whole bodies can carry you.
The snakes scarper away down the tunnel revealing a purple blob on the ground. It must have been carried along by them.

pages.title: FAIRY: DISASSOCIATE
text: Being eaten by a hollowed out pumpkin head fortunately doesn’t result in death and it’s getting a bit cramped in there. You start to squirm your way out through the eye holes in a very goofy yet disgusting manner. For a brief moment this causes Pumk to almost resemble a funny cartoon character from the funny fucking cartoons.

pages.title: FAIRY: BE FREE
text: You sproing out of Pumk’s face with nary a scratch, free as a bird once again.
Actually a bird wouldn’t be free trapped in this crumbling cathedral corridor, they’d panic and fly around in circles for ages.
More like free as a NERD! hehe good one.
You notice that the purple blob on the ground was actually a person! Oh wait you don’t notice that, you don’t give a shit. You actually notice the JEWEL OF SPLISH in his clutches and you want it.
He appears groggy, likely due to a fierce snake-induced writhing BAMBOOZLEMENT. Now is a good chance.

pages.title: FAIRY: STEAL JEWEL
text: Oh look Alley Oop is here, “yo” says Pumk, the two of them finally reunited. Alley looks up from her phone, a gesture of great respect. The fairy pays no mind to this because as was stated at the top of the page it is attempting to STEAL THE DANG JEWEL.

pages.title: FAIRY: STEAL THE DANG JEWEL
text: There we go, easy does it…
Gotcha!
You zip off down the corridor, happy indeed to hold in your tiny hands such a precious jewel. You know exactly where to put this.

pages.title: SIBI: WAKE UP
text: You groggily awaken from your knockout-induced slumber, your lap feels somewhat Jewelless.

pages.title: SIBI: NOTICE JEWELLESSNESS
text: OH SHIIIIIIT!

pages.title: SIBI: FLIP THE FUCK OUT
text: You wiggle your hands around in a motion that’s more symptomatic of a case of the vapors than it is of Flipping The Fuck Out™

pages.title: ALLEY: DIRECT THIS IDIOT
text: You direct this idiot directly to his face, an outstretched finger pointing pointedly in the direct direction of the sequel to the idiot you are directing. The sequel known as the Jewel Theif 2, because that’s what he is, he stole the jewel from Jewel Thief 1 (aka this idiot).
If you want to make this a trilogy maybe go over there and steal it back you dumb idiot asshole, yeah that’s right turn around and look. Hah, made you look, you’re welcome.
Now where have you seen THAT before?

pages.title: MAP: BE A LITTLE MORE CONFUSING
text: We haven’t seen the map since the explosion, things are really fucked up aren’t they?
Whatever happened to Tiki? Surely she must be dead, there’s no way she’s about to appear alive and well.

pages.title: TIKI: APPEAR ALIVE AND WELL
text: You fail to appear alive and well because you are CONFIRMED dead. You sure got fool’d!

Instead of that we’re looking at Pumk and Alley, Pumk is asking whether Alley’s found any cool Pocket Bois recently. Alley says no, she almost caught a NEW but her phone was stolen by that jackass purple robe dumbass. Pumk comments on her use of jackass and dumbass in the same sentence and follows up with a question of whether or not she is an ASS queen. Alley says shut up.

pages.title: ALLEY: CHECK POCKETBOI HAVE
text: You check on your Pocketboi Have game and…Oh your Lord! It’s a shiny Grogel!
This is really rare, you just GOTTA take take a snapshot of it in Augmented Reality mode!
Man what an event, this is the second most interesting Pocketboi you’ve found all month.

pages.title: ALLEY: TURN ON AUGMENTED REALITY MODE
text: You flip the AR switch and the Grogle appears to inhabit the real world! Of course it’s all fake, Pocketbois being real could never happen. You would sigh wistfully at this notion but you are already internally sighing and have been ever since you realised Pocketbois was just a fake video game.
Sigggghhhhh…

pages.title: TIKI: ANNOUNCE PRESENCE
text: You announce your presence politely by asking if either of them has seen the JEWEL OF SPLISH. You don’t know the Pumpkin girl but the presence of little ginger marshmallow reassures you that there won’t be any altercation here.

pages.title: PUMK: ALTERCATE
text: You begin altarcating with a swift bird flip followed by a cheeky smirk and a “get fucked”. If there’s one thing you do well it’s making a strong first impression, though not necessarily a good one.

pages.title: TIKI: RECIPROCATE
text: Incensed, you reciprocate her unruly gesture with a THROWDOWN! A big VS appears to signify a combat duel, likely to include many ATTACKS and SLAPS!
One thing’s for sure though, only one person will leave this battle alive…
Actually you can’t back that up, you have no idea what will happen.

pages.title: ALLEY: POCKET THAT BOI
text: You carefully observe the Grogle, Bois are harder to Pocket in AR mode so you have to be careful..
Ok… now!

pages.title: ALLEY: FLING
text: Shit! He moved!
Ok, no problem, you can just try again.
FUCK!
Ok fuck this, you’ve ran out of pocket balls and now you’re about to waste one of your satchel balls. Well, no thanks, AR mode is just a stupid gimmick anyway.

pages.title: ALLEY: TURN OFF AR MODE
text: There we go.
Wait, what’s happening?

pages.title: FAIRY: CONTINUE TO BE FOLLOWED
text: You are now the Fairy. You have no intention of continuing to be followed, however you have no intention of not continuing to be followed either. To be honest you couldn’t possibly give a shit one way or the other. You’re not in any danger from anyone, this is obvious to you.

pages.title: SIBI: CONTINUE FOLLOWING
text: You are now Sibi again, furious at the little bastard flying away with your hard earned loot, but not furious enough to resist skipping with your arms outstretched apparently.
Looks like they went in here, perfect, you work best in the dark.
Better take a peek first in case it’s an ambush.

pages.title: SIBI: PEEK
text: You peek a glimpse at a giant monitor with a green line wibbling about frantically, it seems to be very distressed.
Did this Fairy asshole come all this way just to watch TV?
No… The TV is saying something. You’re a little too far away to hear properly.
Something something “you escaped” something something “demon” something something “oh shit”.
You can’t make heads or tails of it.

pages.title: FAIRY: DO WHAT YOU CAME HERE TO DO
text: Yes. It’s about time you did.
You ignore the ramblings of the machine, there’s nothing that can stop you now.
Uh.. except that.
The computer is broke, shit, who did that? You need access to the data-banks in order to to do the computery thing that you needed to do.
Maybe you can just force your way in…
Psyche! You knew that he thought he could sneak up on you without you noticing, but you know better than that. What a silly purple boy.
Grab an armful of “not-jewel” ya dingus!
Oh darn, you sure hope that didn’t fuck up the computer any more than it already was.

pages.title: SNAKES: RUN AWAY
text: You fail to run away.

You are now Pumk, or alternatively you are now Tiki. It doesn’t really matter who you are because you feel an immense rumbling and bumbling and have paused your epic fight to look in the direction of it.
You are concerned but not unnerved.
Now you are unnerved.

pages.title: TIKI: DODGE
text: In a moment of high adrenaline you choose to be Tiki and dodge out of the way of a big-ass roundball as it comes crashing through the wall.
You were pretty sure you dealt with this obstruction before, has it come back for revenge? Of course not, it’s an iron ball, it has no autonomy.
It begs the question of how it’s moving side-ways at speed, but since the reader is already well aware of that you’re not going to dwell on it.
Blimey that sure was a hefty ball! It knocked through like fifty walls.
It appears to have run out of steam and landed in a far-off special room. You can tell it’s special because of the colour.
You stare through the holes, it’s quite a sight.
Alright enough sightseeing, let’s get some proactive plot-progressing decision making in here.

pages.title: ALLEY: MAKE DEMANDS
text: You begin making DEMANDS of the tall blue lady. You DEMAND to see where the hole goes and you DEMAND that she give you a lift because you’re too lazy to traverse da hoops to get there. She stares back at you blankly.

pages.title: TIKI: COMPLY
text: You cannot help but comply, the marshmallow girl is just too cute to say no to.

pages.title: TIKI: ENTER SPECIAL ROOM
text: You enter the special room. A raised platform with steps stands prominently in the centre, or the back, it’s somewhere in the room that much is clear.
The roundball sits motionless against the wall. Other than that there’s not much going on, you don’t notice anything.

pages.title: TIKI: LOOK HARDER
text: You look around a bit harder and notice the walls are covered with funny letters and pictures.
You like a good bit of lore and a hieroglyphic wall is the perfect place to find some, perhaps you might learn a bit more about this weirdo cathedral?

pages.title: TIKI: PONDER THE HIEROGLYPHICS
text: Ok, this one’s some sort of ruler commanding an army of… are those ostriches? or ducks? You can’t really tell.
Oh and look that’s the JEWEL OF SPLISH! Hmm, interesting. Very interesting.
Now he’s putting out fire with it. That’s nothing new, you were using the Jewel to protect your hut from the lava. Maybe this is some kind of special event involving a great fire?
Huh, what’s happening here? It looks like the ducks are imprisoning snakes. Are they, like, enemies? Dude, you’re learning so much about history right now.
Wait, what? The ruler turns snakes into ducks? Suddenly you don’t really understand anything. Maybe you were reading them in the wrong order? No that doesn’t seem to make a difference.
There’s a lot to ponder here, a lesser mind would probably deduce that these glyphs mean jack shit and don’t make any sense but you know better.
They clearly… mean… uh…

pages.title: ALLEY: CHECK FOR CORPSES
text: No corpses here, just a bruised Pumk. She mustn’t’ve dodged the cannonball. Idiot.

pages.title: ALLEY: HELP HER UP
text: Pumk awakes, dazed and shook. She thanks her little buddy by changing her dress to one that reads “THX”.

pages.title: FAIRY: SWOOWS RIGHT IN
text: You swoows right into the room. Still firmly in possession of the JEWEL OF SPLISH and looking very pleased with yourself.
Sibi is also here.

pages.title: FAIRY: PLACE JEWEL ON PEDESTAL
text: You float to the top of the pedestal where a tear shaped indent waits for a certain jewel to be slotted into it. You knew it was there, of course. Getting into this secret room was what you wanted the whole time.
How lucky for you the cannonball smashed through here.

pages.title: PUMK: INTIMIDATE TIKI
text: You congratulate Tiki on being a strong fighter but tell her that you would have won if they hadn’t been interrupted. Maybe if they train a bit harder they could stand a real chance against you one day.
Tiki doesn’t respond, clearly admitting defeat. You like submissiveness in an adversary and decide to let her live for now.

pages.title: SIBI: WATCH THE FAIRY
text: You shuffle over to Alley Oop to make the frame composition better and look up at the Fairy thing putting the Jewel on the pedestal.
You’re still all gung-ho about having that jewel, it’s so shiny, must be worth a fortune. Not worth making a move right now though, you decide to wait and see where this goes.
The Jewel immediately starts resonating with a splishy aura upon being placed in the slot.
The jewel begins to rise from the pedestal. It’s positively FULL of beans, it looks ready to blow!
Speaking of things “blowing” there goes the floor. Did you forget that the whole cathedral was crumbling? That wasn’t a thing that stopped happening or anything.
Aw hell, there’s lava pouring in through cracks all over the place! How deadly dangerous.

pages.title: TIKI: THINK FAST
text: You think real fast and equip a bottle of “Flame Retarding Oil”
What? That’s what it’s called, it stops fire, don’t get all uppity it’s a perfectly scientific name.

pages.title: TIKI: USE RETARDING OIL
text: It’s FLAME retard oil, get it right.  You smash the bottle on your head, coating yourself in the oil making yourself immune to fire for a time. Now it makes sense how you were able to survive that massive explosion earlier.

pages.title: TIKI: SURVIVE LAVA
text: You realise a little too late that you could have dodged this. Good thing this Flame Retarding Oil is strong, you’ll probably be alright… probably.

pages.title: JEWEL: DO THE SPLISHY THING ALREADY
text: It would be a perfect time to do a big splishy thing right now what with all the impending burning to death. Luckily it’s just about ready to go.

pages.title: ALLEY: FREAK OUT
text: Dude, what the FREAK?
This is bad, hoo boy. Pumk is out like a light, a light that was turned off.
Also she’s basically dead right now.
There’s only one thing you can do in this situation…

pages.title: ALLEY: GAME HARDCORE
text: You close Poketboi HAVE. It’s not hardcore enough for this, you need to pull out the BIG GUNS.

pages.title: ALLEY: OPEN HARDCORE VIDEO GAME APP
text: You open CRUMBLER 2, the spiritual and also literal sequel to CRUMBLER. It’s important to play the sequel because they fixed that dumb glitch where it would slow down if you crumbled too fast. There’s no time for slow crumbles. No time at all.

pages.title: ALLEY: CRUMBLE
text: The start of the game’s always so dang slow… You just need to accumulate 246 crumbs to unlock basic frenzies. After that it’ll be down to RNG to see if you actually get one. You could purchase the Rubble Bubbler first, which is more reliable albeit slower, but c’mon that’s not NEARLY hardcore enough!
Ok, you have enough to unlock basic frenzies.
C’mon c’mon c’mon c’mon c’mon c’mon c’mon c’mon pleeeeeease…
C’MON C’MON C’MON C’MON C’MON C’MON C’MON C’MON C’MON C’MON C’MON C’MON C’MON C’MON C’MON!
THIS IS VERY IMPORTANT!
YES!
Lap up those crumbs! Man that was tense, you’re glad this all worked out in the end.
Your electronic slab is really heating up due to the hardcore gaming. You can barely touch it. Time to put it down.

pages.title: ALLEY: PUT IT DOWN
text: Ok, that should do for that. Now for the other thing.

pages.title: ALLEY: DO THE OTHER THING
text: You clump a hair bobble and pull hard!
It really hurts. If only you had a blade of some kind.

pages.title: ALLEY: LOOK FOR BLADE
text: Wait, scratch that command, you got it. You experience HAIR PAIN and produce two (2) mallowtears. You don’t add them to your inventory because that would be stupid.
There it goes.
Hey, your hair is the same colour as Pumks head. You never noticed that before.

pages.title: ALLEY: PEER INTO PUMKS LIFELESS GOURD
text: This is pretty morbid, but it looks like it’s going according to plan. The heat from your slab is starting to burn your hair. It just needs one more ingredient.
A big old EXHALE.

pages.title: ALLEY: PERFORM EXHALE ON PUMKS MOUTH
text: You straddle the girl and prepare to give the BREATH of LIFE!
Oh, that’s right you don’t have a mouth. You just uselessly pressed your soft head into hers.
Dangit, where are you gonna find a mouth at this hour?

pages.title: ALLEY: LOOK AROUND
text: You look around, you see that rabbit guy over there is doing something. He has a mouth but you’re not sure you can convince him to blow on Pumks lips anytime soon. He looks pretty busy hypnotising those eels over there.
Or whatever that is he’s doing.
You see the purple dumbass. It doesn’t look like he has a mouth. Though even if he did you don’t really wanna talk to him.
What the hell is he doing over there? Stupid fuck.
To your right you can see the blue lady, what’s her name? You’re not sure she ever introduced herself. In fact she barely says anything… and what the hell is she doing encased in obsidian?
What a weirdo… wait a second.

pages.title: ALLEY: FOCUS INTENTLY ON LIPS
text: Bingo!

pages.title: ALLEY: APPROACH
text: You approach the blue babe, heaving Pumk over your head. Damn girl’s heavier than she looks.

pages.title: ALLEY: MAKE NEW DEMAND
text: KISS THE DEAD GIRL ON THE LIPS! You say, demandingly.
The blue lady leans back, clearly uncomfortable about the demand.
You say “Kiss her, do it! You need to do it!” and she shakes her head and says “I can’t”
You ask her why and she says “I’m not good with intimacy!”
You can’t believe what you’re hearing right now. This blue bitch can’t kiss a girl who isn’t even alive? That doesn’t make any sense!
She doesn’t seem like she’s going to change her mind. It’s time to get serious.

pages.title: ALLEY: PUMK THRUST
text: You thrust Pumk towards the blue bitch. What, you thought it was something else? Get your mind outta the graveyard kiddo!
The blue bitch is pretty good at dodging for someone stuck in a rock, you’re gonna have to kick it up a notch.

pages.title: ALLEY: PUMK FLAIL
text: This is going nowhere.

pages.title: ALLEY: OOP
text: You jump Oop into the air.
You fail to run away.

pages.title: ALLEY: DUNK
text: You dunk the pumk.

You are now TIKI. A pumpkin girls face is laying on top of yours. Something smoulders within. You were anxious about being so close to another person. Even if that person is essentially a vegetable right now.
But now that you’re here, it isn’t so bad.
You feel relieved, you might even…
Pumk staggers back as her fire starts burning again. Gee that was a real roundabout way of having that happen.
You watch as Pumk gets to her feet. She feels around her face, clearly a little unsure of what just happened. You wonder if she’ll remember that moments ago you were touching mouths.
You’re still Tiki by the way.
Ooh she’s mad, she’s very mad. She definitely remembered!

pages.title: TIKI: COWER
text: You cower as fast as you can! There’s not much else you can do in this position anyway and getting slam dunked so hard that the obsidian rock restraining you was smashed into bits didn’t do your limbs any favours.

pages.title: ALLEY: ONLOOK
text: You become an onlooker to the events transpiring out of frame. Finally you can relax again, that was really stressful for a minute there.
You instinctively hold your electronic slab that you don’t have anymore.
Ohh…
Well at least she’s alive again….
She’s paying for a new one though.

pages.title: BAIL JAPE: FINALE
text: You watch the above video, making sure to like, comment and subscribe and SUH-MASH that notification bell right afterwards.
Wait, Bail Jape Finale? Why is this called “Finale”? We’re not quite done yet…
The DEMON has suffered a painful EYE-WOUND thanks to Pumks fanciful paperclip javelin technique. It is not defeated, however, and it wraps a tendril around the weapon, readying itself to PULL IT OUT.
Not sure why i bothered explaining that honestly, the picture does most of the work.

pages.title: DEMON: PULL IT OUT
text: You tug on the paperclip javelin, black sticky blood spills out from your WOUND, OWCH!
It may hurt, but nothing is more damaged than your PRIDE. Actually no, this really hurts, you better do something about it, quick.

pages.title: DEMON: DO SOMETHING ABOUT IT, QUICK
text: You ate the paperclip javelin, ruining it. When you thought to do something about “it, quick” you actually were thinking about the WOUND, but you suppose your pain-induced rage caused a momentary shift in priorities.
Little do you know that you actually were not worried about the WOUND at all and ignored it because of what you KNEW was about to happen.
This is confusing, even for you, i mean me, which is you currently. That paperclip really did some damage it seems.

pages.title: WOUND: HEAL
text: You can’t be a wound! Why does everything think they can just BE abstract concepts?! It’s ridiculous, a wound is not an entity in and of itself, it relies entirely on being inflicted on a living creature!

Anyway it’s gone, the power of the JEWEL OF SPLISH has healed it into oblivion and rendered it wholly unimportant to the story, it’s almost as if there was no WOUND at all! There, see how long you would have lasted if you were that wound? No time at all, that’s how long!

pages.title: PUMK: CONSIDER NEXT MOVE
text: You consider considerably. The DEMON has taken everything you’ve thrown at it, even all of Tikis potions. You don’t have a weapon anymore either. How are you gonna defeat this thing?
Also why is it so gross? It was so cute before…
Wait, it’s doing something new. A dark aura surrounds it…
I just can’t get over how GROSS it is now, i mean gourd damn how many teeth do you even NEED?!

pages.title: DEMON: MESMERISE
text: You cast your MESMERISE spell. Those fools are yours now!

pages.title: PUMK: SCOFF
text: You scoff. This again? Doesn’t this mangled heap of tusks and tentacles even remember that you DON’T HAVE EYEBALLS?
It doesn’t affect you in the slightest, how pathetic, if this is all it has up its sleeve then- huh?
What is she doing holding your arm? I mean, you guess she’s cool, she did good in that fight and defended you and shit but you’re not really a hands-holdy sorta girl so…
You tell her to… uh… oh.
She’s fucking mesmerised isn’t she?
You feel a tug at your leg.

pages.title: PUMK: INVESTIGATE LEG TUG
text: NO! NOT ALLEY OOP!
ANYTHING BUT FAIR ALLEY OOP!
Hehe she looks pretty funny down there.

pages.title: DEMON: VIVIFY
text: You forcibly VIVIFY your ostrich peons so that they may rise again to fight immediately.

pages.title: PUMK: RETALIATE
text: You cannot retaliate in this position. You are exhausted from fighting, Tiki has you in a PUMPKIN LOCK and…
Alley Oop has tied your legs into a knot?
Why is this a thing that she does?!
Wow.. Is this really it? There’s no way that you can escape. That Demon piece of shit can just blast you with water again.
You don’t want to be blasted with water again.

pages.title: DEMON: BLAST HER WITH WATER AGAIN
text: You sure will! But you will hold off for a few moments to savour her eternal dousing.
Hehehehehehehehehehehehehehehehehehehe ok that’s about enough savouring, time to SPLISH!

pages.title: SIBI: YOINK
text: You already did the YOINK! Now it is time to do the RUN!

pages.title: OSTRICHES: COMPARTMENTALISE
text: You do this with ease, it is easy for you now that the influence of the JEWEL of SPLISH has ended.

pages.title: TIKI: SNAP OUT OF IT
text: You snap so far out of it that you snap yourself out of consciousness. Alley also does this. Guys this is not the best time…

pages.title: CEILING: COLLAPSE
text: You begin to collapse because of the extreme damage that has been done to you over the course of the last few hours.
This was always going to happen but only now when it is convenient for the narrative does it actually begin.

pages.title: SIBI: RUN RIGHT INTO A TORRENT OF LAVA AND DIE INSTANTLY
text: HOLY SHIT!
Thank goodness you saw that, you would have run right into that torrent of lava and died instantly if you hadn’t.
You are now Pumk. You kick this purple idiot out of the way of the rapidly approaching bloodthirsty demon.

pages.title: PUMK: STARE INTO THE MAW OF THE BEAST
text: You stand your ground in a truly EPIC fashion. Aw hell yeah you probably look really cool from behind right now…
Wait this was a stupid idea, you should probably have moved, you’re going to die.

pages.title: PUMK: DIE
text: “NOT TODAY”! say the snakes.
Well they don’t actually say that, they can’t speak and instead go “SSSSSS”. But their actions speak far louder than words could ever hope to.
“GRRRRRAAAAAAAAOOOUUOOUOAOAOUOWWRRRLLLLLL!”
Them snakes are alright.

pages.title: PUMK: GET OUTTA THERE
text: Before you get outta there you decide to pick up your friends first.

Well.. one of them is your friend.. i guess they’re both your friends now? You’re not sure. You’re not going to let them burn to death at least. You don’t care about them of course, no way, you’re just taking the moral high-ground here, that’s all.
Ok, no time to think, move!

pages.title: PUMK: NOW GET OUTTA THERE
text: You are now OUTTA THERE and instead you are HERE.
Hey, there’s that Y from earlier! and that tower! What happened over here?
You guess it doesn’t matter. What’s important right now is finding a way OUTTA HERE.

pages.title: ALLEY: WAKE UP
text: Ah, geez.
AH GEEZ!
You are now Sibi and you’re very thankful to have this Y to cling to. This is a pretty sticky situation but you’be been in stickier.
As long as you’ve got your prize jewel that’s all that matters.
NONONONONONONONONO!
NONONONONONONONONONONONONONONONONO!
NONONONONONONONONONONONONONONONONONONONO!
NONONONONONONONONONONONONONONONONONONONONO!
HUH?HUH?HUH?HUH?HUH?HUH?HUH?HUH?HUH?HUH?HUH?
WHAT?WHAT?WHAT?WHAT?WHAT?WHAT?WHAT?WHAT?WHAT?WHAT?
Oh it’s fine.

pages.title: EVERYONE: LAND SAFELY
text: Everyone lands safely on the cooled lava. The JEWEL OF SPLISH appears to have an aura of cooling. But not SO cool that it extinguishes jack-o-lanterns, how convenient.

pages.title: TIKI: WAKE UP
text: You come to. Where are you? What happened?
The reader knows, but they’ll never tell.
Your head is spinning, you appear to have been out of it for a few minutes. Your “vessel” on this lava sea appears to have drifted far from the cathedral, you can see it in the distance.
Dang… that place is TRASHED.
Epic.
This seems like a perfect place to end…
But there’s something you’ve spotted off to the side. You being Pumk btw, sorry i forgot to mention when you switched perspectives.
And by “I” i mean me, not Pumk, or you, who is Pumk right now.

pages.title: PUMK: LOOK AT THE THING YOU’VE SPOTTED
text: Why wouldn’t you be looking at the thing you’ve spotted? That’s what spotting IS.
It’s the Y from earlier, it appears to have been drifting around and you’re about to drift past each other.
You feel like rescuing those snakes stuck on it.
“Y”? you ask? Hehehe, that’s actually really funny.
Hey there little guy, you got him.
Remember when you were scared of snakes? In fact you were scared of THESE SNAKES IN PARTICULAR.
That feels like it was a whole year and three months ago, how time flies when you’re engaging in japery on bail.
You don’t even know what bail IS.

pages.title: PUMK: COLLECT SNAKES
text: Hell yeah!

pages.title: BAIL JAPE: END
text: And as the lava currents pull them away from the camera, we say goodbye to this strange collection of idiots.
Where are they going? Noone knows. I mean, I know, i’m the author. But THEY have no idea at all.
But that’s another story entirely, one with more characters, locations, perhaps even speech bubbles???
One thing’s for sure, this is not the last we’ll see of Sibi, Tiki Wikimikimau (oh yeah, that’s what her full name was), Alley Oop and Pumk.
And those two snakes as well.
But BAIL JAPE is over for now and i suppose i should stop pussyfooting around, and say
THE END

comics.name: Horsestuck
description: What if you read "Homestuck" by Andrew Hussie and you thought "that was neat"?
And what if you wanted to make your own version of Homestuck, starring you and your internet friends?
And what if you hosted that adventure on MSPAFanventures?
And what if that websites days were numbered?
And what if you then moved it to your own website?
And what if you read it?

pages.title: Horsestuck
text: A young man stands in his bedroom.

That's pretty much all he's doing, i wonder why he's doing that? Doesn't he have things to do? What sort of loser stands still doing nothing but looking around as if he doesn't recognise his own room?

Well perhaps there's a perfectly reasonable explanation for this odd behaviour, maybe he's tracking a fly, who knows? it's really a completely pointless transgression from the original point, this fucker is standing still.
What is his name?

pages.title: Continue Parroting.
text: Your name is GIBBON.
You don't own a parrot but even if you did you don't know how you would continue one, you know what ENDING a parrot would mean, but that's just SICK, why would you even think about that?

You have a variety of INTERESTS. You have a LUSCIOUS mane of hair. You really like DADROCK but you're totally OPEN to other forms of music. You have a YOUTUBE CHANNEL  but it ISN'T VERY GOOD. You also like playing GUITAR.
What will you do?

pages.title: Gibbon: Inspect that pony plushie.
text: You gracefully hop into inspection distance of the plushie.
This plushie is so choice you find yourself unwilling to touch it for fear of making it icky, so it usually sits on the bed.
In fact it always sits on the bed. Ever since you put it there you've taken to sleeping on a pile of clothes on the floor, somehow you believe this is ok and not in any way retarded.

pages.title: Gibbon: Do a backflip.
text: You do a totally rad hyperfloop off the chest, causing it to spring open.

pages.title: Gibbon: Look inside the chest.
text: You peer inside the chest, inside it are a variety of THINGS, THINGS that may or may not be coming out of the chest anytime soon, THINGS that are important and THINGS that aren't or maybe they are, WHO KNOWS? You certainly don't.

Man there sure are a lot of THINGS in here, how would you even be able to sort all the important THINGS from the non-important THINGS even if you DID know which THINGS were important? You could be there for hours sifting through all these THINGS, it'll be like scraping through a sea of legos trying to find all the cool pieces to make your spaceship with. Not that there are any actual legos among the THINGS in this chest, though you couldn't be totally certain, they could be buried underneath yet more THINGS.
Goddamn that's a lot of THINGS...

pages.title: Gibbon: Take some THINGS already.
text: You take FOUR THINGS out of the chest, your notepad of AMAZING IDEAS, a LAZER POINTER, your HIPPO PLUSHIE and a copy of Hunter Davies's THE BEATLES, THE AUTHORISED BIOGRAPHY. These THINGS are definitely more THING than the other THINGS and are therefore worthy to be mentioned.

pages.title: Gibbon: Examine Notepad.
text: Before you can examine your NOTEPAD you need to CAPTCHALOGUE it in your SYLLADEX, unfortunately your FETCH MODUS is set to ABSOLUTE FUCKING MYSTERY so you'll never be able to tell what'll come out, in this case calling for your NOTEPAD resulted in the BEATLES BIOGRAPHY emerging.

pages.title: Gibbon: Examine Biography instead.
text: Well this book is pretty good anyway, you recall reading about the rough and tumble teddy boy gang that John Lennon used to head and how John and Paul wrote a bunch of songs on an empty top deck of a double decker bus. Now THOSE were the days, it would have been so cool to be present during that magical bus journey, nay even to have seen the very bus they rode, or to gaze upon the toupee of the bus driver who no doubt could hear them up there making what he would probably have called an AWFUL RACKET, little did he know that one day-
oh.
Looks like someone's trying to message you.

pages.title: Gibbon: Check your computer.
text: This is your COMPUTER. It's brand new actually which is why the desktop looks so bare.
Usually it'd be full of bright, complex and interesting documents and programs. Alas you have only the BARE ESSENTIALS set up, you'll probably get 'round to everything else later.

On your desktop is SONY VEGAS PRO which you use to make your shitty videos for your shitty YOUTUBE CHANNEL. Even though the videos always turn out TREMENDOUSLY shitty you make a point to own the "PRO" version, as an indicator to yourself that eventually your skills will match your equipment and when that happens it will be the greatest day of your life!
But you didn't come here to make videos, you came here to answer a Skaipe message.

pages.title: Gibbon: Answer the dang Skaipe message.
text: Skaipe log 1

pages.title: Gibbon: Check download progress.
text: You open up μHorse to check on your Horseload progress, the progress bar appears to have moved a little, or has it?. You wonder why they didn't build a percentage gauge into this thing, it would make it a lot easier to tell.
Skaipe log 2
Looks like the internet connection is out, what an annoyance.

Though maybe it's a blessing in disguise, you were kind of making a fool of yourself there. Though not that it matters, if you get the internet working again, they'll see everything you said anyway. It's an annoyance in disguise as a blessing in disguise as an annoyance.
SO ANNOYING.

pages.title: Gibbon: Rage push against the desk.
text: You violently shove yourself backwards and injure yourself like an idiot.
What was that supposed to achieve? You sure are stupid getting all worked up over the internet being down for little more than 10 seconds, maybe you should just kill yourself.
Yes, that's a good sane reaction.

pages.title: Gibbon: Pick up the gun.
text: Well here we go.

pages.title: Wait.
text: Let's not do that.
The internet usually turns itself back on within a few minutes, you should probably occupy yourself with less deadly activities until that happens.

pages.title: Gibbon: Take the gun anyway.
text: You captchalogue the PLECTRUM, it will probably be useful later.

pages.title: Gibbon: Go look at your guitar.
text: You go over to your guitar. You consider yourself to be PRETTY GOOD at it but not enough to be a professional.
That's ok though, you're not sure you're cut out for a musicians life, your DAD was a musician and he told you how hard it used to be trying to get by.
He has another job now and does music as a hobby, which seems like a more sustainable lifestyle and you feel like you're probably heading in that direction too.
You used to have dreams of being the next big guitarist but eventually you realised that you weren't passionate enough to really practice hard.
You decided making it a career isn't that important as long as you have fun with it.
And it is fun.

pages.title: Gibbon: Pluck dose strings.
text: You start plinkin' and plonkin' strammin' and strummin' and twiddling your G-string and fingering A minor and it feels RATHER PLEASANT.

pages.title: Gibbon: Strike an original pose.
text: BWEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE!

pages.title: Gibbon: Captchalogue that sweet axe.
text: You store the "sweet axe" in your sylladex.
Funny... you've never called it an "Axe" before, such a term is totally alien to your vocabulary, you wonder how you could even have thunk such a thing?
Could this be a subtle yet relevant plot point? Perhaps it could even be a VERY IMPORTANT DETAIL that will definitely come up again in the future.
Yes, you're 100% convinced that is the case.

pages.title: Gibbon: Hide in that pile of clothing.
text: You're way ahead of you. Hiding in the clothing is clearly the next logical course of action.

pages.title: Gibbon: Sniff clothing.
text: You sniff the pile of clothes that currently cocoon you. They definitely smell of something...
Oh god.
They smell awful up close.
It's not surprising really, you were supposed to wash these a long time ago but you just never had the time, you swear!

pages.title: Gibbon: Remove all your clothes.
text: You captchalogue the clothes, thereby removing them. Except the ones you're wearing of course, those can probably last a few more days before you start to feel mildly uncomfortable in them.

pages.title: Gibbon: Leave room.
text: You decide to leave the room, you could put the clothes in the washing device while you wait for the internet to turn back on. There's no time like this particular second right fucking now, as they say.

pages.title: Gibbon: Quit hallucinating.
text: Oh shit, you aren't even there, how HIGH do you even have to BE to have not noticed this??
How are you going to wash your gross stinky clothing now?

pages.title: Camera man: Zoom out.
text: You zoom the camera out so the audience can see more of what's going on, which is absolutely nothing at all because Gibbon is on a raft in the middle of the ocean you guess.

pages.title: Camera man: Observe.
text: Well this isn't very interesting.

pages.title: Gibbon: Be doing something.
text: The only "something" you could be doing is inspecting the box with the big red button on top so that's exactly what you do.
There's nothing unusual about the box apart from the GLARINGLY obvious big red button but you're discounting that because it's too obvious...
But you're going to press it, i mean good lord look at that thing.
You've been on this raft for like THREE YEARS or some shit, god dammit press the big red piece of shit button before i LOSE MY MIND!

pages.title: Gibbon: Push the button.
text: No you idiot not the BOX, the BUTTON!
